kv16.6:2.5: nanu anārammaṇaṃ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv16.6:2.7: Hañci anārammaṇaṃ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv16.6:3.1: ☑ Alobho sahetuko sārammaṇo, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv16.6:3.3: Rūpaṃ sahetukaṃ sārammaṇaṃ, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv16.6:3.21: anottappaṃ sahetukaṃ sārammaṇaṃ, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv16.6:3.23: Rūpaṃ sahetukaṃ sārammaṇaṃ, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv16.6:4.1: ☑ Rūpaṃ sahetukaṃ anārammaṇaṃ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv16.6:4.3: Alobho sahetuko anārammaṇo, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv16.6:4.5: rūpaṃ sahetukaṃ anārammaṇaṃ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv16.6:4.8: anottappaṃ sahetukaṃ anārammaṇaṃ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv16.6:5.6: Hañci rūpaṃ sappaccayaṃ, tena vata re vattabbe—
